scripts.ensure-docs: echo 'Checking for docs...' && (cp -r ../!docs ./docs 2>/dev/null && echo 'Copied from parent dir' && ls -la docs/) || (xcopy /E /I "..\!docs" "docs" 2>nul && echo 'Copied via xcopy' && dir docs) || (echo 'Could not copy from parent dir, checking if docs already exist' && (ls -la docs/ 2>/dev/null || dir docs 2>nul) || echo 'No docs found')
scripts.build: echo 'Backend build complete' && npm run copy-docs
scripts.copy-docs: echo 'Force copying docs...' && (cp -r ../!docs ./docs 2>/dev/null && echo 'Successfully copied docs' && ls -la docs/) || (xcopy /E /I "..\!docs" "docs" 2>nul && echo 'Successfully copied via xcopy') || (mkdir -p docs 2>/dev/null || md docs 2>nul && echo 'Created empty docs folder')
